009package imagingbook.common.util.choice;
010
011import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
012import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
013import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
014import java.lang.annotation.Target;
015
016/**
017 * Defines an annotation to mark nested (member) subclasses within a class or interface
018 * to be eligible as choices to be instantiated.
019 * @see Choices
020 * @author WB
021 *
022 */
023@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
024@Target({ElementType.TYPE})
025public @interface DeclareChoice {
026        public String value() default "";
027}
